website_summaries.verdict: This ergonomic pillow is designed to prevent flat head syndrome and ensure your baby gets a comfortable night's sleep.
pros: Lightweight and easy to carry with you wherever you go
Ergonomic cutout supports your baby's neck without putting pressure on the back of their head
cons: Some parents feel that the pillow is too thin for their baby

customer_reviews.title: Warning label clearly states decorative item not for infant use.
customer_reviews.text: Warning label clearly states decorative item not for infant use.
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Does not prevent flat head
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to try and prevent my baby from having a flat head. Unfortunately, it gave my baby a weird shape with a bump in the middle. He is 4 months now and he hasn’t used it in over a month and the bump has not gone away. It’s awful. I don’t know what to do now.
customer_reviews.author: TheMrs.

customer_reviews.title: Best of 4 Brands Bought & Tested
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is so well designed! I bought 4 different brands of pillows (boppy, hidetex, and “pillow for newborn”) to test for the most effective one at preventing my baby’s flathead from getting worse, and this one was hands-down the best. The materials and manufacture quality make this pillow 100% worth it, and my baby seems SO comforted by resting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Definitely helps!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 2 months old and we noticed her head was starting to get flat. She slept in a rock n play at night because she liked the incline. So we bought 2 of these to help with her head. It's been one week and it has already helped the back of her head. We use it when she is in the rock n play, bassinet, pack and play, and on the changing table when we change her. It has done wonders! We really didn't want to have to have her where a helmet and she won't need to because this pillow has really helped!
customer_reviews.author: maranda giebler

customer_reviews.title: Really helped my son fix his flat head
customer_reviews.text: At two months, my son was developing a flat spot on the back of his head and my pediatrician was starting to discuss the possibility of referring him for a helmet if she did not see improvement at his 4-month visit. We got this pillow and used it in his bed and when he was playing on the floor. In two months, we saw lots of improvement. By six months, with the pillow and him spending less time on his head, his head is perfectly shaped now. We are so thrilled with this product. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin @ SmallBizMama

customer_reviews.title: I was so skeptical about this pillow. I must ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical about this pillow. I must say that I am impressed. After the first day of using this pillow I could see the shape change of my son's head. Its been a month and he will be 4mos in a week. His flat head is definitely changing.
customer_reviews.author: Brina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this. You will regret
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this product. I used it for 4 days for my 6weeks baby. My baby’s head got the shape of hole inside this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Shravya Siluveru

customer_reviews.title: Try another product
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review because I am a person who purchases products based off what kind of reviews it has so I just wanted to give my honest opinion. Bought this product For my daughter who suffers from plagiocephaly. I thought it may help with the rounding out her head because I seen a lot of reviews on here which said that it helped but I’ve been using this pillow for a little over a month and I don’t see much of a change honestly I wouldn’t really recommend this to anyone because it didn’t help me. SAVE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: JaLisa

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: my twins hated it. It was pushing their heads too far forward making it not a pleasant experience for them. Returning both pillows. *By the way, it says on the pillow that it’s a decoration pillow and is not intended for infant use
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for new little ones.
customer_reviews.text: My little one slept really well on these head pillows and it definitely helped her head to round out as she was growing. After 4 months though, she wasn't staying still enough to keep using them. It washes very well and doesn't move around too much when she is sleeping. I still use one on her changing table and it works really well to cushion her head. I recommend them to all of my friends to help make sure their little ones heads don't get flattened on one side and they agree that it is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow! My son had a lil bit of a flat spot on the back of his head. No matter how many times I tryed repositioning his head while asleep he would turn his head back. Once I bought and started using this pillow his spot went away with in weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Hurn

customer_reviews.title: Its the most basic model but get a Mimos instead
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on our changing pad because our baby was often being changed. I also purchased this because of the price. I eventually bought a Mimos and wish i had invested in that sooner. Along with CanDoKiddos guide to avoiding the baby helmet, seeing an osteopathic cranial manipulator I feel like the Mimos could have helped me sooner. I ended up spending even more $$ because I was trying to save money.
customer_reviews.author: SaucyKatLady

customer_reviews.title: A Must Try for Me
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about my baby daughter getting some flatness of the one side of her head as she was only sleeping on that side. I purchased this after her doctor mentioned it for two appointments in a row. My daughter seems very comfortable while laying on it and it really does help keep her head straight. Very well made with nice quality fabric and memory foam. It’s been perfect for her so far. She’s been using it for over a month now and she’s 2 3/4 months right now.
customer_reviews.author: ashlyn

customer_reviews.title: Too light, bad material
customer_reviews.text: The material is just too light, my baby moves around and it’ll flip over onto his face so I’m constantly getting up to get it off him. I eventually just tossed it out of his crib. It will be better if they made the bottom rubbery or weighted it down somehow so a baby learning to turn and squirms a lot doesn’t flip it over.
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, quickly developed holes
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for my twins. Unfortunately after only a couple weeks they developed holes in the seams. I am disappointed with the quality and wouldn’t recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I can see how this pillow may work for a newborn baby that doesn't move too much but there is no way my 4 month old would benefit from it. Within one minute of laying my son down on the pillow he had somehow got the pillow on top of his face. There is no traction on the backside to keep it from moving. The pillow is a lot smaller than I thought it would be but it was too big to use in a carseat. I will be returning the pillow unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Heather_Renee

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: I just received my pillow, and it looks used. There is hair all over the hole where the baby’s head goes. When I’m buying thing for my baby I would like clean products. And no where on the package or on the booklet says if it is machine washable or not. I’m grossed out.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyeeeeshehee

customer_reviews.title: Definitely prevents and is convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 2 other pillows and my child still had a flat spot on his head even though he had a perfectly round head when he was born. This product has definitely prevented the flat spot to become worse and it might just be me but it seems that the flat spot has slightly become better. Love that this pillow can fit a stroller or highchair also because the other products I used were to bully for them (picture is using product in a highchair).
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: If you are even thinking about preventing a flat baby head..BUY and USE from birth onward..
customer_reviews.text: Order a few of these before your baby arrives! The perfect shower gift most parents don't even know they need! Didn't think I would need preventive plagiocephaly pillows but my babies perfect little noggin started to flatten after 7 weeks or so! I should have started out with these but thought they were gimmicky. Now we have several of these all over the house and they are worth every cent. Not the best for correction but I believe they are preventative. At least her head is not getting worse. Perfect for the carseat, swings, bouncer, and her changing tables.
customer_reviews.author: Martinus  Dyrud

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t made any difference in my little guys head. We have used it every night for almost two months. Plus he rolls off of it and than is limited to space in his bassinet. He rolls his head on it more than without one. I honestly think he is uncomfortable when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our baby got great results with this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: We started using this pillow with our daughter at about three months. She had a had so flat in the back you would not believe. She even had a big indention in her head that formed from lying on her back. She's now four months old, the indention is completely gone, and she's even getting a bit of roundness on the back of her head! I didn't expect it to work this well honestly. She still sleeps next to us so we will continue to use it until she goes into her crib in a few weeks. She's started rolling so it won't be safe to use if she's not in the same room as us.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Webster

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it helps but it does give me peace of mind. I don’t like that it makes babies hair fuzzy when she’s laying on it. Now that baby is 6 months it’s kind of useless because she’s just moves right off of it. But from newborn until then it’s worth it. Maybe if you don’t want baby to have a fuzzy head while using it, maybe put a satin pillowcase over it or maybe they can make one for it in the future that would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not safe/useless
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt fix plagiocephaly. Go to a doctor to fix it with an orthopedic helmet. Also pillows are not safe for babies to sleep with. Increases the risk of SIDS
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 14 week old when I noticed his head wasn't as round as it should be. I wish I had it sooner! This review is for the plus/premium version. He's been using it for a week consistently(any time he is placed laying on his back) and it has made such a difference! His head is back to being more round again! He is becoming more and more wiggly and he did manage to move completely off of it 1 time, but it has far exceeded my expectations. I do check his positioning often and he is held a lot, but when I can't hold him I'm glad I have this!
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaM

customer_reviews.title: Good if you use it correctly
customer_reviews.text: My daughter sleeps through the night so I only use this for day time naps because I don’t want her on the pillow for 8+ hours at a time. I have seen improvements. It is a little thick and the baby looks a bit uncomfortable, but trust me, they’ll let you know if it is. All the reviews saying it made their babies hair fall out, if your baby is moving their head from side to side their hair is gonna fall out, the pillow has nothing to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica V

customer_reviews.title: does not help with flat spots
customer_reviews.text: Son got a flat spot even with the constant use of this product. Its also hard to wash, and stains easily.
customer_reviews.author: maya

customer_reviews.title: Doctor says her head is rounding out nicely!: )
customer_reviews.text: Echo most of the other reviews with regard to washing. It took some reshaping after we washed it, so i wish you could take the cover off, BUT we did find it helpful with reshaping our girl's head. This pillow plus constant tummy/upright time helped us avoid a helmet! Doctor says her head is rounding out nicely! :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works well for our baby!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product for the last week to prevent a flat head on my 2 month old. So far, I'm happy with this purchase. We only use it during the day as it's not approved for safe sleep. Baby uses in swing, on playmat, and during supervised naps in bassinet with no issues. She's a fairly active babe but it stays in place and rarely moves around. Design is cute and a good size for her (she is petite, though). Have not attempted to wash it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ham

customer_reviews.title: We used this pillow until 3 months in our daughters ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this pillow until 3 months in our daughters car seat. It is a flatter style pillow & works really well in the car seat. For play time we had another pillow that was thicker & had a little more cushion. I believe this pillow did help relieve pressure off flat spot.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: I like this pillow, baby sleeps great, still has flat head tho
customer_reviews.text: My baby likes this but it’s not preventing flat head at all. He sleeps great on it though so I’m glad I purchased it. I’m working on preventing flat head by rotating his head while he sleeps and putting a rolled towel next to him to keep him in place.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie f

customer_reviews.title: Use earlier
customer_reviews.text: I should have had my baby using this all night sooner. Now, we have a flat spot and got this pillow, but she’s big enough that she wiggles off of it before she even falls asleep, so it hasn’t done much good. I do feel that if I had had her on it from the get-go the misshapen head would not have occurred.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for changing tables
customer_reviews.text: I use this primary for the changing table. Keeps baby in place and makes changing him much easier. You can also use on the go or when baby is playing on the floor. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Erika Gil

customer_reviews.title: 2 month old and no flat had or loss of hair
customer_reviews.text: My two month old has been using this since birth and he still loves it. His little noggin fits snuggled right in and has no flat head or loss of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kris L

customer_reviews.title: This is a decorator items only and not intended for an infant’s use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item due to avoid flat head for my baby. I thought this item can help. But when I read instruction, it was written “Pillows are decorator item only and are not intended for an infant’s use” I couldn’t believe this description. The outer package definitely describes that helps for Flat head for infant. But instruction doesn’t. In the previous package, this description seems to be written in the back side of outer box. But current one which I bought doesn’t such description in outer box.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had had it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product because of the extra support and comfort I feel like it offers. I will say I don’t think it’s made a huge difference in the shape of my babies head but I probably should have started using it sooner. My only real complaint is that I wish it were easier to clean. After awhile it does get a little dirty and it’s hard to get clean.
customer_reviews.author: nieljo4

customer_reviews.title: Info pamphlet says: “NOT INTENDED FOR INFANT USE”
customer_reviews.text: Received item new and unopened, but in the manual that comes with, it actually states that the pillow is for decoration only and not intended for infant use. This is completely at odds with their advertisement on Amazon. It also does not describe how or where you should use it, because it actually tells you NOT to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but needs different material
customer_reviews.text: I do think the pillow has helped with my 3 month olds head. I’ve noticed it’s not as flat after using it for 1 month. However, the fabric is like a Jersey/t-shirt material and it has rubbed the hair off the back of her head. Some of her hair is now stuck to the pillow and now she has a bald spot. I know it’s not hurting her and her hair will grow back but I think the company should definitely change the material it’s made of.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Duplessis

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different pillow because my newborn hated this one. Unclear as to what exactly the issue was but the other pillow was half the price and is highly preferred to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This head support is fantastic! We bought one more so we don’t have to keep transferring it upstairs and downstairs. Her head stays supported, it has a slant to fit the neck of the neck, it’s firm but soft. Her head has stayed in good form and she also has not developed the bald spot in the back due to it helping keep her head comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!! Definitely will recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave four stars is because I wish they would make a case of some sort or make the cloth easier on the hair. My son has lost hair in it :( However, five stars to the actual help it gives! My son loves it, it’s super soft and comfortable and he is 10 weeks and we’ve had it for a week and already can tell a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pillow for infant!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about my infant's flat head, this pillow helped! Easy to wash since you just toss it into washer machine, perfect fit, all around great product!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: unsure....
customer_reviews.text: Im on the fence and a bit unsure... My babies head is nice and round, but after using it for a month I noticed she was getting this odd flat spot right where the gradient of the pillow starts at the top, I can't 100% say its because of the pillow, but I can't say it isn't.....
customer_reviews.author: Briana L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for rounding out head of preemie
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed! My son’s head was REALLY flat (preemie) and we were talking about having to get a helmet if there was no change or progress from 4 to 6 months. It’s been almost 2 months and his head is becoming MUCH rounder and we are looking at not needing a helmet now!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fix for a flat head!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this pillow for my baby for about a week and can already see a difference. I noticed his head getting flat and wanted to try this before having to spend thousands on a helmet. I’m impressed! It even washes well too!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Foy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Helped!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to wash it in washing machine and then air dry it and it was fine. It isn’t as soft as I thought but that is okay because too soft would be bad for baby. I was worried to put a head support in the crib but after I saw a small flat spot on one side of my babies head I got this and it fixed within a few days. No joke I totally saw a difference! I was happy! My son sleeps in his crib the side of our bed so we can check on him. I would recommend this for flat head syndrome but keep an eye out for babies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t really use it enough
customer_reviews.text: I plan on returning this pillow. I bought it for my daughter when she was 2 months. She had a mild flat spot that the doctor pointed out. Since you can’t use this pillow in their bassinet/crib or car seat, it leaves only opportunity to use this in a swing or bouncer seat. However, I feel that the edge of the pillow made my daughter’s chin touch her chest more, which then turned into fear or closing off her airway.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Grob

customer_reviews.title: Good support but my son wiggles out of it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for my 4 month old since I brought him home from the hospital. This provides good head support but now that my son can wiggle more, he wiggles right out of it. I think it’s great for newborns but doesn’t really help as they get older and can move more
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hornbuckle

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend for newborns, we never noticed our son was laying to only one side.. we were so sleep deprived and just grateful he was sleeping! After we got this, his head has started to round back out and he’s no longer laying to one side! Definitely will have this if we ever have another baby, from birth!
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Edgerton

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help at all
customer_reviews.text: maybe it would have worked for other babies but for ours, her head just got worse but she also ended up having a neck issue. Either way if she's laying straight on her back with her head in it, we hoped it would help. We used it for about a month before she was able to roll out of it but it's very soft I just wish it could go in the washer
customer_reviews.author: Fearless One

customer_reviews.title: Great product really works
customer_reviews.text: We love this pillow! We used one 3 years ago for our daughter and just bought one again for the new baby arriving soon! I really believe it works supervised never leave your child sleep with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does more harm than good
customer_reviews.text: Awful. I used it for less than one week and my baby got an indent at the back of his head. I really wanted this pillow to work. I went back to reviews of this pillow and saw that it did the same to another reviewers baby where it caused the shape of a hole. I wish I would’ve read all the reviews before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: roseyprima23

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use too often!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, just don’t put baby on it too often or they will develop an indention on the back of their head. After two months of use at night I’m taking it away to try and even out the head.
customer_reviews.author: chaddi norris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it, it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for preventing the flat had of my daughter, but it didn’t helped at all. I read a lot of good reviews of this product, but I don’t suggest to buy it, try other pillow!I’m doing this review after 3 months of use and before this pillow my baby didn’t have the flat head
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has done exactly what I was hoping for our little baby boy. He had quite a flat spot, and using this pillow in his car seat and stroller has helped his head to shape in a more natural way. He still has a little flat spot but you can’t really see it, I can feel it at the touch. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Samp; Christian

customer_reviews.title: Use a cotton shirt to cover the foam
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft but baby hair snags. I put a baby t shirt over it to stop the hairs from snagging on the material which Works great. My baby has a little bit of a flat head so I’m using this to help. I like it a lot just wish they had a pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: Charming AF

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves this
customer_reviews.text: Keeps his head in place and makes my baby comfortable! I even take it with us when we travel for his night time routine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: Great in theory but didn’t work for my poor Flatish headed lad. He did not dig the angle it held his neck at and would just turn his head side to side in it until he eventually worked his way off of it. I would have to keep putting him back on it and it just wasn’t worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri223

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results for so cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I would have taken a before picture with my little girl. The back of her head was slanted from favoring her right side. I bought this pillow and within a week it's gone. She loves it as well. I highly recommend this pillow. It is the BEST.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for baby!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this since my baby was born and I think it’s been helping. My baby didn’t like tummy time so when she was laying on her back it was nice to put something behind her head to prevent a flat head.
customer_reviews.author: JohnC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for helping your baby’s head shape. My baby’s head was getting flat and it improved significantly after using this for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mozolic

customer_reviews.title: didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I understand and see the concept of how this could work, however, my newborn was constantly moving and so would move off the pillow and completely defeat the purpose of the pillow. It works as a nice memory foam pillow, but our baby would not stay on it. This was returned pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: DML

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I really didnt see any difference with using this pillow.It doesn't do what its advertise to prevent flat head.baby started using it since he was 2 months and now he is almost 5 months and he hated sleeping with that pillow.Its not really comfortable for a babies head.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Yee

customer_reviews.title: bought 3 of these
customer_reviews.text: Must buy! Bought one for home, grandmas, babysitters. has helped our babys head so much in the last 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute I love it, I do wish you could remove the cover so that it was easier to wash but really it only gets the occasional drool on it. I have noticed a great improvement in my sons flat spot, he also seems to be able to turn his head in both directions more easily.
customer_reviews.author: AlanaGTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not prevented flat head!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for my 3 month son. We are use about a month with this pillow. But doesn’t see any help...also the neck support too high for baby.Very uncomfortably!
customer_reviews.author: biubiubiu

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought it sooner! My baby slept with it perfect and it has held its shape after being washed. Helped with baby’s head shape. If your baby is rolling over I do not recommend them to sleep with because it does not move away from them easily. Works great in our swing and play gym too.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We really like this pillow for the baby, it fits his head well and even though he slides off of it during the night he seems more comfortable with it than without it. I also don’t blame the pillow for him sliding down since he was doing it before we purchased it. Anyways, it’s a good product! Hoping there will be a size up when he outgrows this one.
customer_reviews.author: aMazonshopping12

customer_reviews.title: Baby pillow
customer_reviews.text: Love this bought it fir my granddaughter who is due in 7 weeks can’t wait to use it ❤️ Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Too small, we returned this.
customer_reviews.text: We returned this because it was so small! My 3 month old doesn’t have a huge head, and it just wasn’t fitting right. We ended up buying different pillow that we loved and still use!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Wish we'd found this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Our newborn seems to really like how comfortable this product is. She literally sleeps like a baby. We've only been using it a few weeks but we're very hopeful that it helps with her head shape.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon White

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it will help..
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be helping. Really takes the pressure off the back of his head. And he doesn't seem to mind it at all most the time. The part that goes under his neck doesnt bother him either. It's very soft and squishes down so its not uncomfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Very good pillow but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This was the only one I found that had some sort of doctor approval. Ollie fits the baby head shape perfectly. But for something of so simple construction made in China, this is very overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Sunil

customer_reviews.title: No cover - hard to wash
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with a cover. It gets very dirty very fast and so I've had to throw the entire thing in the washer.. it is now warped only after a month of use and I can't use it anymore, as it is no longer safe for my baby's neck.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very mild case of flat head cleared up in about 2 weeks. Bought at 4 months and still using at 7 months. I don't recommend putting this in the carseat, it makes baby's head lean forward too much.
customer_reviews.author: Slus

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Second one I have purchased. Got one for my granddaughter her head was starting to look flat used this a few time and could start telling a differents. Keep using it and her head is round and she did not need the helmet. I just got this one for my niece her baby is due in Aug.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Milk got spilled on it so I had to throw it in the washer. Don't do it, the pillow wasnt a heart shape anymore, it lost its form. I didn't throw it in the dryer either. Thought it would be a nice material inside but it's just foam
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Fackiner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: Soft and very light material. Very comfortable for baby and his head rest on it very well. The small size allow it to place in the crib or bassinet. I would love to see it with a cover to make it easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Singh Baghel

customer_reviews.title: Pillow does it’s job but pulls/break infant’s hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the pillow is helping to reduce head flattening, however it is causing my daughter’s hair to break off! She moves her head during sleep and one side and the back of her hair has begun to break and feel course
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Only a week in
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this for my 2 month old baby who started showing a little flat spot on the right side of his head. We are only a week in, but I’m noticing less of a “flat” spot. He was evaluated for torticollis, but is perfectly fine just has a preference for looking to his right. Will update after a month of use and see where we are!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: save your money.
customer_reviews.text: my baby is dealing with mild plagiocephaly so i bought this to combat it. it doesnt help at all. he can still turn his head and now i constantly worry about the increased risk of SIDS. its just not worth the risk- see a doctor if you have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: corinne

customer_reviews.title: Only for newborns
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is too small for any child, other than a newborn. It slides off easily from under the baby's head. It does not stay in place and the material will grab their hair and pull it out. It needs a smoother case. However, it is soft and would be ok for a newborn that doesn't toss and turn as much.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: What's with the warning label?!
customer_reviews.text: I love the pillow and all, but what's with the warning label that says NOT INTENDED FOR INFANT USE, to be used as decoration only?!
customer_reviews.author: S. Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Get this asap
customer_reviews.text: Got super scared of baby possibly having a flat spot. Started this and everyone tells me how perfect her head is shaped. Its great especially for the baby who wont let u mive thier head when they sleep
customer_reviews.author: Sara Callinan/trivett

customer_reviews.title: Let’s keep those babies heads round folks:)
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for my babies head while she lays on her back in the living room floor
customer_reviews.author: Cynnamon

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this
customer_reviews.text: Purchase and then return. I consulted with my sons pediatrician and she recommended we didn’t use it since it still elevates the head a bit. I also didn’t like my newborn would look while using it, his neck was a bit bent.
customer_reviews.author: Sirue Morfin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I swear this helped my baby’s plagiocephaly. We even used it in the infant carrier on walks.
customer_reviews.author: EmC

customer_reviews.title: Really helps
customer_reviews.text: I started freaking out when I noticed my baby's head looking flat. I bought this and it helped so much. She has a perfect shaped head now.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Can still turn the head!
customer_reviews.text: It helps with the flat spot, because of the shape, but it doesn’t prevent the baby from favoring one side, so my baby still turns his head to one side
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: But this style of pillow.
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING! After using this pillow for only 1 day, we have seen significant improvement in the shape of my daughters head! At her 2 month checkup, her pediatrician was worried about the shape of her head and was talking about potentially having to get her a helmet. The pillow has seriously started helping her head shape correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest White

customer_reviews.title: Not necessary
customer_reviews.text: After looking up ways to avoid mush head (flat head) I cane upon this. It’s cute but really it’s unnecessary. You really don’t need this. Your baby will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tameka

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work! I started using it when my baby was just 1 week old, religiously, and he still developed a flat spot on his head! Now we are looking into other options and trying more yummy time. We may even have to consider the helmet. We bought this thinking it would work due to the reviews and description. Don’t be fooled!
customer_reviews.author: Jayneil S.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift & my daughter’s head stayed round.
customer_reviews.text: My daughters head never deformed from sleeping flat on her head.she never had hair loss on the back of her head I bought several as gifts. These are awesome, absolutely loved it
customer_reviews.author: Monika/Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: This thins does NOT prevent flat head. It may slightly help but prevent is does NOT. It was soft & my little one enjoyed sleeping on it once he got use to it but I could’ve just purchased him a regular pillow for the results I got. Definitely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but limited places to use bc of size
customer_reviews.text: We use this pillow some on crib or floor, but it is not practical on other baby equipment like swing or lounger bc the surface isn't flat. The head hole is correct size but the upmost cushion part is too "tall" to use in our cosleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: This came very fast and packaged safely. Will order again items came in perfect condtion. Thanks you. Items worked perfect
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: best product out their
customer_reviews.text: saw difference my son had mild to moderate and it seems to shape up.We use it in play pen when he sleeps and also in the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow !
customer_reviews.text: 100% worth every penny. I only wish I had bought sooner. My little one loves it to, I feel it actually helps the baby sleep better. I can’t yet say the effectiveness on flat head but I can feel that baby’s head is lifted when I place my hands under the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: CINDY H.

customer_reviews.title: To late for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a little too late for my daughter. She was already 7 months and it didn't do much for her head. But she doesn't like using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Hermosillo

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It helps so much with my baby’s flat head!! Started using at 3 months and within one week we saw improvement! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Boxia

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible my packaged came ripped & opened like as if it was a returned item & my daughter used it for one night & when she woke up the back of her neck was bleeding & had scratches on it from the label/tag on the bottom of the pillow rubbing on her neck
customer_reviews.author: Leannie

product_meta.title: Babymoov Lovenest Baby Head Support | The Worlds First Pediatrician Designed Pillow to Prevent Infant Flat Head (From 0+)
product_meta.description: Style:Lovenest| Color:GrayThe Babymoov Lovenest was designed and patented by Dr. Manuel Maidenberg, well-known Pediatrician, who noticed that a side effect of having babies lie on their back was the development of postural plagiocephaly, or flat-head syndrome, due to the weight of the baby’s head lying in the same position for a long period of time. The Lovenest’s unique ergonomic design helps to remove the pressure from the back of the skull and distribute it evenly, allowing the head to maintain its proper shape while the skull is still forming during the first year of a baby’s life. The soft, breathable cotton fabric ensures comfort and ventilation, while baby sleeps. The Lovenest can be used from birth – an added benefit to its design is that it creates a cocoon-like holding effect that soothes and reassures the baby. PROMOTES PROPER HEAD SHAPE: A baby’s head remains very malleable up until around the age of one year. The patented tilt and special shape of the Lovenest combined with its unique breathable cotton fabric ensures even distribution of pressure across the baby’s skull, which helps maintain the proper head shape until the skull is fully formed. The pillow can be used from birth to begin promoting healthy skull development beginning with the first days of your child’s life. HELPS TO PREVENT FLAT HEAD SYNDROME: While the correct lying position for a baby is on his or her back, a potential side effect is the development of plagiocephaly, or flat head syndrome, as the weight of the baby’s head lies practically in the same position. The Lovenest removes the pressure from the back of the skull and distributes its evenly, helping the baby’s skull to remain rounded with no compromise. The simple design of the Lovenest means that it can be used for your baby throughout the day as an insert in a baby swing, rocker or stroller to continually promote healthy head shape and skull development. VERSATILE DESIGN AND USE: The Lovenest’s simple and unique heart-shaped design makes it very easy to use. It is an ideal insert in a baby swing, bouncer, or stroller to maximize the head and neck support for your baby throughout the day. The pillow’s breathable fabric provides perfect ventilation for your child’s head and neck. LIFETIME WARRANTY: All Babymoov products carry a lifetime warranty. Simply register your Lovenest at service-babymoov.com within two months of purchase.
feature_bullets: THE ORIGINAL SINCE 2005: Created by well-known pediatrician Dr. Manuel Maidenberg, the Lovenest has proven for over a decade to play a key role in babies' healthy skull development

THE SOLUTION TO PREVENT FLAT-HEAD SYNDROME: Its patented design distributes pressure evenly over the skull while letting babies move their head freely. This creates a unique cocoon-like holding effect that effectively helps prevent postural plagiocephaly
SOFT & COMFORTABLE FOR BABY: The Lovenest is made out of luxurious and breathable fabric, gentle on baby's skin and providing great comfort.

EASY USE WITH ALL BABY GEAR: Portable and lightweight, the Lovenest is recommended from birth as an insert for a bassinet, swing, bouncer, baby gym, stroller and more to maximize the head and neck support babies need
EASY CARE: The Lovenest is easy to clean and can be machine-washed on gentle cycle
